content.name: storage_furniture
content.label: Storage Furniture
content.gloss: furniture that contains many shelves, drawers, boxes to store stuffs

content.name: cabinet
content.label: Cabinet
content.gloss: furniture that has shelves and drawers

content.name: mirror
content.label: Mirror
content.gloss: a reflective surface, now typically of glass coated with a metal amalgam, that reflects a clear image.

content.name: mirror_frame
content.label: Mirror Frame
content.gloss: Frame of a mirror

content.name: mirror_surface
content.label: Mirror surface
content.gloss: The reflective surface of the mirror

content.name: glass
content.label: Glass
content.gloss: glass

content.name: chest
content.label: Chest
content.gloss: Box with a lid; used for storage; usually large and sturdy

content.name: chest_lid
content.label: Chest lid
content.gloss: Lid of a chest

content.name: lid_surface
content.label: Lid surface
content.gloss: Surface of a lid

content.name: chest_box
content.label: Chest box
content.gloss: Box part of a chest

content.name: appliance
content.label: Appliance
content.gloss: Appliance

content.name: oven_range
content.label: Oven range
content.gloss: Oven with stove for cooking

content.name: microwave
content.label: Microwave
content.gloss: an oven that uses microwaves to cook or heat food

content.name: dishwasher
content.label: Dishwasher
content.gloss: a machine for washing dishes automatically

content.name: refrigerator
content.label: Refrigerator
content.gloss: an appliance or compartment that is artificially kept cool and used to store food and drink

content.name: sink
content.label: Sink
content.gloss: plumbing fixture consisting of a water basin fixed to a wall or floor and having a drainpipe

content.name: washbasin
content.label: Washbasin
content.gloss: a bowl for washing

content.name: faucet
content.label: Faucet
content.gloss: a device by which a flow of liquid or gas from a pipe or container can be controlled

content.name: drain
content.label: Drain
content.gloss: a channel or pipe carrying off surplus liquid, especially rainwater or liquid waste

content.name: water
content.label: Water
content.gloss: Liquid substance

content.name: cabinet_frame
content.label: Cabinet frame
content.gloss: the frame of the cabinet

content.name: countertop
content.label: Countertop
content.gloss: the horizontal work surface that is frequently installed upon and supported by cabinets (typically found in kitchens, bathrooms, workareas)

content.name: shelf
content.label: Shelf
content.gloss: a support that consists of a horizontal surface for holding objects

content.name: top_panel
content.label: Top panel
content.gloss: a board-like part that forms the top most panel of a shelving unit

content.name: bottom_panel
content.label: Bottom panel
content.gloss: a board-like part that forms the bottom most panel of a cabinet or table, often will touch the ground totally

content.name: back_panel
content.label: Back panel
content.gloss: Back panel of a bookcase, table, or cabinet

content.name: base_side_panel
content.label: Base side panel
content.gloss: Side panel for a base

content.name: vertical_divider_panel
content.label: Vertical divider panel
content.gloss: Vertical divider panel making one big shelf into smaller cubbies

content.name: vertical_side_panel
content.label: Vertical side panel
content.gloss: main vertical support side panel

content.name: vertical_front_panel
content.label: Vertical front panel
content.gloss: main vertical support front panel

content.name: frame_vertical_bar
content.label: Vertical support bar
content.gloss: a near-vertical bar/strip like part that help form the frame

content.name: frame_horizontal_bar
content.label: Horizontal support bar
content.gloss: a near-horizontal bar/strip like part that help form the frame

content.name: frame_slant_bar
content.label: Frame slant bar
content.gloss: a slant bar/strip like part that help form the frame. The angle between a slant bar and the ground should be around 30~60 degree. Otherwise, it should be annotated as either vertical or horizontal bars.

content.name: cabinet_door
content.label: Cabinet door
content.gloss: Door for a cabinet

content.name: cabinet_door_surface
content.label: Cabinet door surface
content.gloss: Surface forming the cabinet door

content.name: hinge
content.label: Hinge
content.gloss: a joint that holds two parts together so that one can swing relative to the other

content.name: handle
content.label: Handle
content.gloss: the appendage to an object that is designed to be held in order to use or move it

content.name: object
content.label: Object
content.gloss: Various objects found on shelves

content.name: book
content.label: Book
content.gloss: a written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together along one side and bound in covers.

content.name: television
content.label: Television
content.gloss: a device that receives television signals and reproduces them on a screen.

content.name: clothes
content.label: Clothes
content.gloss: items worn to cover the body.

content.name: shoes
content.label: Shoes
content.gloss: a covering for the foot, typically made of leather, with a sturdy sole and not reaching above the ankle.

content.name: vase
content.label: Vase
content.gloss: a decorative container, typically made of glass or china and used as an ornament or for displaying cut flowers.

content.name: picture_frame
content.label: Picture frame
content.gloss: A framed picture or photo

content.name: drawer
content.label: Drawer
content.gloss: a boxlike container in a piece of furniture; made so as to slide in and out

content.name: drawer_box
content.label: Drawer box
content.gloss: The box part of a drawer (most of the time, only the drawer front will be present for annotation)

content.name: drawer_front
content.label: Drawer front
content.gloss: Front of the drawer

content.name: drawer_side
content.label: Drawer side
content.gloss: Side of the drawer

content.name: drawer_bottom
content.label: Drawer bottom
content.gloss: Bottom of the drawer

content.name: drawer_back
content.label: Drawer back
content.gloss: Back of the drawer

content.name: drawer_rails
content.label: Drawer rails
content.gloss: Rails on which the drawer goes

content.name: drawer_slider
content.label: Drawer slider
content.gloss: Sliders on the drawer which attach to the rails

content.name: cabinet_base
content.label: Cabinet Base
content.gloss: a support or foundation for base. It includes but is not limited to leg base, foot base, etc.

content.name: chest_base
content.label: Chest Base
content.gloss: a support or foundation for base. It includes but is not limited to leg base, foot base, etc.

content.name: regular_leg_base
content.label: Regular Leg Base
content.gloss: a shelving base that is composed of several vertical leg-like supporting sub-parts, possibly with several connections between legs, and contacts the ground by the legs, some horizontal bars or the foot/caster structure on the legs

content.name: bar_stretcher
content.label: Bar Stretcher
content.gloss: a supporting part joining the legs that is of bar/strip like shape

content.name: foot_base
content.label: Foot Base
content.gloss: a shelving base that contacts the ground via foots/casters. There is no long vertical leg in the base.

content.name: short_leg
content.label: Short Leg
content.gloss: a very short leg that connects the table seat and the table foot/wheels

content.name: leg
content.label: Leg
content.gloss: one of the supports for a piece of furniture

content.name: foot
content.label: Foot
content.gloss: a support resembling a pedal extremity

content.name: panel_base
content.label: Panel Base
content.gloss: a shelving base that contacts the ground via panels/boards.

content.name: caster
content.label: Wheel Assembly
content.gloss: a pivoting roller attached to the bottom of furniture or trucks or portable machines to make them movable

content.name: brake
content.label: Brake
content.gloss: a restraint used to slow or stop a vehicle

content.name: caster_yoke
content.label: Caster Yoke
content.gloss: forked part for connecting wheel to mounting plate

content.name: caster_stem
content.label: Caster Stem
content.gloss: post part of caster rig

content.name: caster_mounting_plate
content.label: Mounting Plate
content.gloss: a sheet of metal or wood or glass or plastic

content.name: wheel
content.label: Wheel
content.gloss: a simple machine consisting of a circular frame with spokes (or a solid disc) that can rotate on a shaft or axle (as in vehicles or other machines)

content.name: buckle
content.label: Buckle
content.gloss: buckle to close the lid
